title: How good of a writer do I have to be in order to write for Medium? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are three types of writer, and you need only be one of them in order to do well on Medium. Writers with a story to tell  These guys are everywhere, including right here on Quora. You might even be one of these, Craig. A lot of people liked Fifty Shades for the story, not the writing itself. This is how you get popular. Writers who excel at the writing itself  These guys probably have a couple degrees, and might work in the field. They’re a bit more serious and a bit less fun, but they know a thing or two about grammar, spelling and punctuation. This is how you get true fans and followers who want to be like you. Writers who combine the above two points  Well, We’d all like to get there wouldn’t we? The fact is you need a combination of raw, unadulterated talent COMBINED with years of acquired technical skill. The only way to get this is to goddamn write like your life depends on it, expect the worst, and hope for the best.
